description: Please ensure that if the notice falls within the bounds of the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), include the following requirements in the description:\\_\Estimated quantity of commodity: 1\_\_\_\_Duration of contract:\_\_The initial contract period will be from date of contract award and end on 2024-04-17, with four (4) irrevocable options to extend it for one (1) year periods.\_\_\_\_Time frame of delivery:\_\_The initial contract period will be from date of contract award and end on 2024-04-17, with four (4) irrevocable options to extend it for one (1) year periods.\_\_\_\_Any conditions for participation of suppliers not specified in solicitation documentation: N/A
full_summary:
## Quality Assurance Specialist/Analyst – Level 3 Tender Announcement
### Español | Français

**Reference Number**: PW-23-01024681

**Publication Date**: February 3, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: March 16, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST

**Open To**: Informatics Professional Services

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Tender Description**: This tender is seeking a qualified organization to provide quality assurance and analytical services to the government. The contract will be of a fixed duration spanning from the date of contract award to April 17, 2024, with four (4) irrevocable options to extend it for one (1) year periods.

**Key Requirements**:

* Estimated quantity: 1
* Time frame of delivery: As per the contract period
* Participation of suppliers: No additional conditions apply

**Attachment**: The detailed tender package is available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/03/ec4667cbbd1a4f0d83de1a459884475b/ic206094_npp.docx](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/03/ec4667cbbd1a4f0d83de1a459884475b/ic206094_npp.docx)

**Contact Information**:

* Christine Shields, christine.shields@ised-isde.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-542-7294
* Address: 235 Queen St, Ottawa, ON K1A 0H5

**Agreements**: This tender is subject to various trade agreements, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT), and others. Please refer to the attachment for the complete list of applicable agreements. 

Note: All information regarding this tender announcement is available in the attachment provided.
